text: @ Obsidian Forum hitps:/fforum obsidian.md > command-to-reload-obsidian § Command to reload Obsidian - Help Jan 11, 2021 — Or another way: In the editor, press Ctrl + P (maybe Cmd + P in M up alist of commands, then type reload and select Reload app .. People also ask How do you restart obsidian command? How to reset obsidian to default? How do you force refresh obsidian?
